title: all: release-branch.go1 requires some patches when using gcc4.8
body:
For now,

cmd/cc: fix typo leading to index out of range
https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=419dcca62a3d and 

and

misc/cgo/stdio: make it work on Windows and also test it
https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=80ab25ffe4ca

Just FYI someone who wants to run benchmarking go1 vs. go1.1 vs. go1.2.
